data.description:
*NEW UPDATE: Vacation Simulator players can now experience a more immersive environment with real-time shadows, creating a world that feels more natural on the Meta Quest 3.

*NEW UPDATE* Introducing experimental Hand Tracking! Enjoy a new way to play with your very own HUMAN hands!

*NEW DLC* Provide 5-Star service and enjoy endless tasks in new DLC ‘Vacation Simulator: Back to Job

Welcome to the Vacation Simulator: a rough approximation of VACATION inspired by real human NOT JOBBING. Reallocate your bandwidth and get ready to splash, s’more, snowball, and selfie your way to optimal relaxation! 

Amenities:
●   Experience Vacation Island, your destination for optimal relaxation and/or efficient memory-making!
●   Customize a virtual YOU for picture-perfect selfies!
●   Wave to interact with a colorful cast of Bots!
●   Splash in the silicon sea and bask in simulated sunlight, all without getting sand in your… hands! 
●   Get lost connecting with your roots, nodes, and branches... then get actually lost on a hike! 
●   Elevate your ice-sculpting skills to new heights and reach peak cozy by knitting mittens for a snowhuman!

changelog.change_log: Support for updated hand tracking - Hands 2.0!!

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Reverted Oculus Integration update due to start-up crashes reported by some users

Vacation Simulator - High Frequency Hand Tracking Patch #2

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Photo sharing to Facebook via the backpack is now re-enabled on Quest 2

Gameplay Fixes
• Added hand tracking smoothing to portable radio and rock climbing
• Improved hand tracking interaction with avatar customizer buttons

Other
• Updated to latest Oculus Integration
• Fixed various minor issues

High Frequency Hand Tracking Support
• Now supports new High Frequency Hand Tracking on Quest 2!
• Improved tracking and lower latency
• Performance improvements to allow for overhead of updated hand tracking
• Possible slight increase in jitter (particularly under low light), will be addressed in future Oculus updates
• More details: https://developer.oculus.com/blog/high-frequency-hand-tracking/

Visual Fixes
• Avatar bust changes save correctly

Other
• Updates to credits

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Corrected a save crash issue due to recursive save data references

Hand Tracking Fixes
• Improved timing of re-enabling of finger colliders on release so fingers are less likely to become stuck inside cups
• Improved on/off dials so they are easier to turn
• Updated stowing logic for the backpack to make items easier to stow over the shoulder
• Increased StoryParentBot’s acceptance radius for items so it is easier to hand things to bots using hand tracking
• Rock skipping is now slightly easier to do when using hand tracking
• Tweaked the Ukulele setup so it can be played more easily when using hand tracking

Gameplay Fixes
• Hot, hot tub water put into a cup is now hot
• OpsBot Screen is now referred to correctly in picture descriptions
• Pie photo descriptions no longer have “and”s with missing spaces
• Ice pick can now break objects out of ice blocks, including break out the hot tub controls
• Gravity no longer remains low if the exit burrito is used in the DiveSite
• Butter bottle no longer pours when not held
• Hotdog and sausage 3-packs now count properly as Hotdog Weiner Waffle in Infinite Waffle
• Items saved to backpack in melting state no longer get stuck in backpack

Visual Fixes
• Knitted books no longer turn black
• First DiveSite zone no longer has black outline in photos

Other
• Fixed various minor issues

New Features
• Experimental Hand Tracking Support!

Feature Update
• Full support for 90hz enabled on Quest 2
• Added recentering option in the backpack settings

Other
• Fixed various minor issues

Hotfix
• Fixes physics timing issue on Quest 2 if running 72hz instead of 90hz

New Features
• Experimental Hand Tracking Support!

Feature Update
• Full support for 90hz enabled on Quest 2
• Added recentering option in the backpack settings

Other
• Fixed various minor issues

New Features
• Full support for Quest 2!
• Fixed Foveated Rendering is turned off by default on Quest 2
• Future support for 90fps on Quest 2 when fully enabled by the Oculus platform
• Quest 2 controllers shown when using a Quest 2

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Player will no longer teleport below ground during hiking with Smaller Human Mode enabled

Gameplay Fixes
• Using multiple fish mouths to blow on the harmonica no longer prevent harmonica from making sound and no longer causes whistle to loop audio indefinitely 
• Third kid in IceCreamSlinger now has another reject line for something that is not a pie or not ice cream
• BanditBot will now only accept cheese if it's not frozen
• OpsBot will now trade camera lenses
• Carrot now counts a weiner in Endless Hotdog Gig
• Pulling a can tab and switching hands no longer deletes the hand when the tab vanishes after a few seconds
• Fixed issue where sometimes the player was unable to complete the Gone Fishes gig in Back to Job
• Updated the auto-orient when picking up the gaming joystick so the Quest 2 controller rings no longer collide
• Corrected the starting position of Vacation Bot when first experiencing the Party

Other
• Fixes some subtitles typos
• Various performance improvements
• Fixed various minor issues

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Fixes crashes related to loading between environments
• Eating the exit burrito while teleporting no longer causes you to be stuck in a void forever
• If you eat the exit burrito while holding the camera while it is in the pocket of the backpack with the other hand, you no longer become stuck in a void forever
• Intro task no longer becomes stuck if player waves at GigBot while giving rating
• Fixes camera becoming unable to take pictures
• Fixes rare stability issues due to subtitles
• Bots no longer accept business credit cards and exit burritos, which caused crashes
• Waving no longer cancels BaristaBot’s burger request in ‘Back to Job’
• Feature Improvements
• TempBot now requests 1 to 4 star items in the Infinite StarScanner gig

Visual Fixes
• Soap bar displays appropriate highlights when half eaten
• Improved visual quality of VacationBot’s ‘Back to Job’ costume
• Various Port-A-Shrub issues have been fixed
• Font visibility for some video games and the GigBoard is improved
• Camera hover particles no longer separate from camera when relocated by a Bot
• GigBot no longer transforms into VacationBot if the museum lever is pulled without a passport inserted
• The size of condiment icons have been slightly increased on the GigBoard for some infinite gigs
• Bots in ‘Back to Job’ move more natural when transitioning between gigs
• BanditBot hat now hides player avatar hair correctly
• Other glasses are no longer visible when looking through the front side of pancake glasses
• Replacement hat no longer disappears from BabyBot’s head
• RiverBot glasses no longer move when level of detail increases
• Forest teleport reminder tablet no longer faces up, instead of facing towards player
• Flower highlight now appears correct on shrubbed crab shell when animating
• Fixes rendering on seaweeds
• Giglr Mix icons for volume and channel are now more clear and distinct

Gameplay Fixes
• StarScanner and TempBot now agree on star ratings for books
• Breakable items will now break upon impact when used with the slingshot
• RaftBot dialogue timing now implemented as intended in ‘Back to Job’ 
• Fixed volume of the StarScanner not decreasing when bots are talking
• Improved the flow of certain infinite gigs if requested items are already liquid or slices
• Fixes InfluencerBot phone is being removed from backpack after returning to museum
• FishMaster cartridge no longer unlocks in the main game from ‘Back to Job’
• JobBot’s business card no longer disappears from backpack
• Honeymooners now respond to waving when requesting chocolate in ‘Back to Job’
• Berries and mushrooms no longer enlarge quickly after placing them on certain points
• OpsBot tube tray now retracts consistently in ‘Back to Job’
• Certain fruits will no longer be incorrectly identified as “Eaten” by StarScanner
• OpsBot now gives different items for pancakes and waffles
• Bots now accept either a chonky choco bar or a chocolate bar when requesting chocolate
• Bots now able to drink out of both coconut halves
• GigBot expressions during promotions now working as intended
• Auto-orientation of dumb-bell, phone, and StarScanner have been improved
• All cups (not just mugs) now attach to drink floatie

Other
• GigBoard now plays a sound effect when GigBot gives player their first 5 stars
• Fixes error with voxel optimization during sandcastle cleanup
• Fixed various minor issues

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
-Adds some missing subtitles lines
-Fixes binary subtitle option in ‘Back to Job’
-Fixes rare issue where some infinite tasks were evaluating progress -incorrectly
-Fixes issue where sandwiches disassemble when slices were frozen
-Fixes softlock caused by exit burritoing and teleporting at the same time

Visual Fixes
-Photos of infinite bots now show a generated name and description
-Fixes SandcastleBot costume not appearing in camera

Other
-Fixes babyBot ejecting incorrect item at dangerously high speeds
-Fixes drink maker having inconsistent behaviour when mixing drinks and solid items
-Can no longer destroy camera and other important items by flushing pool
-Fixes some subtitles typos
-Fixed various minor issues

Vacation Simulator: Back to Job - New Expansion!
• New job-style tasks working the new Vacation Island’s Poolside Cabana
• New infinite mode!
• New interactions, including Star Scanner, Port-A-Shrub and easy access to most food and food preparation cooking stations from the main game

New Features
• Added support for Oculus Mixed Reality Capture

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Fixed crash with Exit Burrito
• Fixed various black screen issues

Visual Fixes
• Fixed subtitles rendering depth issue
• Fixed auto-orient of ski poles
• Fixed broken highlight on the Forest rock bridge
• Fixed ocean foam not rendering around items
• Item state now shown correctly on the back of photos

Other
• Various performance improvements
• Fixed various minor issues

Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Major improvements to memory usage to alleviate crash and lock-up issues when backgrounding (pressing the Oculus Home button)
• Taking photos of photos of photos... no longer stores an unneeded reference to every previous photo, causing memory issues
• Fixed backpack deleting items if they were stored over your shoulder and your backpack happened to be full and you hadn’t yet taken your backpack out during the play session
• Fixed very rare rendering crash in the Mountain
Feature Fixes
• Eye patches now work on snowman
• Subtitles typo fixes
• Fixed issues with stacking multiple sandwiches together
• Credits in options now correctly resets when loading a new save
• Hands now making correct sound effects when interacting with river water
• Taken photo attached to camera now orients the correct direction when taken rather than re-orienting continuously, which made it appear like it was a double sided photo
• Fixed multiple items not rendering an icon when dehydrated
Gameplay Fixes
• Fixed randomization timing of retrieving volleyball from river
• Fixed issue when placing a melting item in your backpack which had resulted in the item not storing in your backpack
• Fixed targets not appearing after shooting a single target in an area, leaving area and returning to it
• Fixed an issue with an invisible wall partially blocking one target in the forest
• Fixed VacationBot VO sometimes playing incorrectly when interacting with resort scanner
• Resolved an issue where completing a set of photos and leaving zone too quick causes memory to not be correctly received
• Ski doors now correctly close when immediately releasing ski poles
• Fixed IceBot sometimes not delivering dialog when pulling “Judge Me” lever
• Fixed timing of SportsBot giving the memory in relation to their dialog
• Fixed sports sometimes abruptly ending when player grabs the Beachball
• ‘Super Untextured Quad’ can now correctly be resumed after playing it the first time
• Backpack no longer occasionally snaps to the wrong position for one frame when pulling it out
• Fixed an issue with VacationBot not talking when you swiped your watch at the same time as getting a memory
• Fixed a rare bug that would cause a hermit crabs’ shell to become permanently highlighted if it hovered up to your hand
• Fixed a rare issue of VacationBot being in the wrong location during the end of the intro
• Radio in backpack now continuously plays
• Numerous misc fixes
Performance Fixes
• Optimize ice sculpting decoration
• Performance fix for taking off backpack with a dehydrated food item stored in it
• Optimizations to save file size
• General game optimizations
Visual Fixes
• Fixed issue with dock shop door not visually opening correctly when returning from dock
• Shrub flowers are now visually shown when you waffle a shrubbed item
• Fixed hat and glasses lenses visually disappearing on snowman when you teleport away
• Credits fixes
• Fixed incorrect teleport highlight on rocks in forest river
• Fixed grab highlight flicker that sometime appeared on camera and shrubbed paintings
• Visually improved underwater cutoff in river
• Photos attached to camera no longer clip through backpack when camera is placed in it
• Grammatical fixes in “Choose Wisely’ video game
• Corrected image representation of ‘balloon’ in Vacaypedia
• More typo fixes in Non-Work Station email than we would like to admit
• Water splash VFX and SFX no longer incorrectly play when trying to grab anything inside of Fruit Punch container
• Fixed numerous pieces of geometry not rendering correctly when taking a photo
• Fixed waterfall speed in the Beach
• Vanilla ice cream no longer looks like chocolate ice cream when printed from the printer

Bug Fixes
• Improvements to memory usage to help alleviate some crash and lock-up issues when backgrounding (pressing the Oculus Home button)
• Fixing rare case of infinitely spawning of radios in the Resort

Change Notes
• Fixed a possible memory leak when saving
• Fixed an issue where a saving could fail to save images
• Fixed the possible memory leaks associated with Dehydrated Food
• Optimized the dehydrated food textures
• Optimized the waffled item textures
• Fixed a possible crash on loading items from memory
• Removed debug button combination that was causing performance issues
• Optimized memory usage for various sound effects
• Fixed an error occurring when too many sounds were playing concurrently
